body.subject: Deployment unblocked - starting staged rollout per deployment.json
body.summary: Acknowledged Epic 28 approval and deployment unblock. Updated deployment.json status to READY. Starting staged rollout per deployment.json: staging → canary → production. All monitoring, rollback plans, and health checks ready. Deployment will proceed with validation gates at each stage.
key_points: Deployment.json updated: status changed from BLOCKED to READY
Deployment unblocked: quality approval received (release_gate: true)
All blocker requirements met: implementation.json complete, code implemented, test_evidence provided, security tests pass, performance tests pass, layer boundary validation verified
Deployment strategy: staged rollout (staging → canary → production) per deployment.json
Monitoring ready: 6 Prometheus metrics, 3 Grafana dashboards, 7 alerts, 2 health checks
Rollback plans ready: per-task, full, partial - all tested
Shared infra services: MongoDB, Prometheus, LLM API ready and operational
concerns: Monitor deployment metrics during staged rollout
Validate health checks at each stage
Watch for rollback triggers: error rate > 1%, latency p99 > 30s, health check failures > 10%
Ensure shared infra services remain operational during deployment
body.action_needed: Starting staged rollout: Stage 1 (staging) → Stage 2 (canary 10%) → Stage 3 (production 100%). Monitoring Prometheus metrics and structured logs. Will use rollback plans if triggers activated. Deployment progress will be reported via structured messages.
